name: Complex.isTheta_ofReal
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
f : α → Real
l : Filter α
⊢ Asymptotics.IsTheta l (fun x => ↑(f x)) f
decl:
theorem isTheta_ofReal (f : α → ℝ) (l : Filter α) : (f · : α → ℂ) =Θ[l] f :=
  .of_norm_left <| by simpa using (Asymptotics.isTheta_rfl (f := f)).norm_left

name: Complex.isLittleO_ofReal_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : Norm E
l : Filter α
f : α → Real
g : α → E
⊢ Iff (Asymptotics.IsLittleO l (fun x => ↑(f x)) g) (Asymptotics.IsLittleO l f g)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem isLittleO_ofReal_left {f : α → ℝ} {g : α → E} : (f · : α → ℂ) =o[l] g ↔ f =o[l] g :=
  (isTheta_ofReal f l).isLittleO_congr_left

name: Complex.isLittleO_ofReal_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : Norm E
l : Filter α
f : α → E
g : α → Real
⊢ Iff (Asymptotics.IsLittleO l f fun x => ↑(g x)) (Asymptotics.IsLittleO l f g)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem isLittleO_ofReal_right {f : α → E} {g : α → ℝ} : f =o[l] (g · : α → ℂ) ↔ f =o[l] g :=
  (isTheta_ofReal g l).isLittleO_congr_right

name: Complex.isBigO_ofReal_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : Norm E
l : Filter α
f : α → Real
g : α → E
⊢ Iff (Asymptotics.IsBigO l (fun x => ↑(f x)) g) (Asymptotics.IsBigO l f g)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem isBigO_ofReal_left {f : α → ℝ} {g : α → E} : (f · : α → ℂ) =O[l] g ↔ f =O[l] g :=
  (isTheta_ofReal f l).isBigO_congr_left

name: Complex.isBigO_ofReal_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : Norm E
l : Filter α
f : α → E
g : α → Real
⊢ Iff (Asymptotics.IsBigO l f fun x => ↑(g x)) (Asymptotics.IsBigO l f g)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem isBigO_ofReal_right {f : α → E} {g : α → ℝ} : f =O[l] (g · : α → ℂ) ↔ f =O[l] g :=
  (isTheta_ofReal g l).isBigO_congr_right

name: Complex.isTheta_ofReal_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : Norm E
l : Filter α
f : α → Real
g : α → E
⊢ Iff (Asymptotics.IsTheta l (fun x => ↑(f x)) g) (Asymptotics.IsTheta l f g)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem isTheta_ofReal_left {f : α → ℝ} {g : α → E} : (f · : α → ℂ) =Θ[l] g ↔ f =Θ[l] g :=
  (isTheta_ofReal f l).isTheta_congr_left

name: Complex.isTheta_ofReal_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : Norm E
l : Filter α
f : α → E
g : α → Real
⊢ Iff (Asymptotics.IsTheta l f fun x => ↑(g x)) (Asymptotics.IsTheta l f g)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem isTheta_ofReal_right {f : α → E} {g : α → ℝ} : f =Θ[l] (g · : α → ℂ) ↔ f =Θ[l] g :=

name: Complex.isBigO_comp_ofReal_nhds
initialProofState:
f g : Complex → Complex
x : Real
h : Asymptotics.IsBigO (nhds ↑x) f g
⊢ Asymptotics.IsBigO (nhds x) (fun y => f ↑y) fun y => g ↑y
decl:
lemma isBigO_comp_ofReal_nhds {f g : ℂ → ℂ} {x : ℝ} (h : f =O[𝓝 (x : ℂ)] g) :
    (fun y : ℝ ↦ f y) =O[𝓝 x] (fun y : ℝ ↦ g y) :=
  h.comp_tendsto <| continuous_ofReal.tendsto x

name: Complex.isBigO_comp_ofReal_nhds_ne
initialProofState:
f g : Complex → Complex
x : Real
h : Asymptotics.IsBigO (nhdsWithin (↑x) (HasCompl.compl (Singleton.singleton ↑x))) f g
⊢ Asymptotics.IsBigO (nhdsWithin x (HasCompl.compl (Singleton.singleton x))) (fun y => f ↑y) fun y => g ↑y
decl:
lemma isBigO_comp_ofReal_nhds_ne {f g : ℂ → ℂ} {x : ℝ} (h : f =O[𝓝[≠] (x : ℂ)] g) :
    (fun y : ℝ ↦ f y) =O[𝓝[≠] x] (fun y : ℝ ↦ g y) :=
  h.comp_tendsto <| continuous_ofReal.continuousWithinAt.tendsto_nhdsWithin fun _ _ ↦ by simp_all
